LanguageData.ElectronicCraftingSpeed.label: Electronic crafting speed
LanguageData.ElectronicCraftingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person crafts electronic devices.
LanguageData.StonecuttingSpeed.label: stonecutting speed
LanguageData.StonecuttingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person cuts rough stone into blocks.
LanguageData.CollectingSpeed.label: Collecting speed
LanguageData.CollectingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person collects clay, sand, peat, etc.
LanguageData.TailoringSpeed.label: tailoring speed
LanguageData.TailoringSpeed.description: The speed at which this person makes clothes.\n\nThis stat only affects how fast clothes are produced, not their quality. Quality is determined by the tailor's crafting skill.
LanguageData.SmithingSpeed.label: smithing speed
LanguageData.SmithingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person crafts weapons, machinery, and ammunition.\n\nThis stat only affects how fast items are produced, not their quality. Quality is determined by the crafter's skill.
